lines.text: [Richard rides his bicycle down the streets and almost runs over Donald, carrying shopping bags]
I'm sorry, Donald! I didn't see you!

[Angrily]
Hey, Jackson! There's a plane leaving in the morning for Moscow. Why don't you get on it? Commie bastard! Left-wing freak!

[after the station wagon crashes into the supermarket]
Hey, tell me, Tony. How do you like your eggplant?
